NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: Friends, I shall be traveling to Ember Twin with Phlox before your expedition. Might there be any way to protect ourselves from the terrible heat from this star system's sun? 2 1 MELORAE: Goodness, Plume! Haven't you heard? The new suits have integrated ore from Timber Hearth to help us resist the heat 3 2 PHLOX: How I wish we could have had that technology when we were constructing the Quantum Moon locator! 4 3 PLUME: We would not be where we are today without your 5 3 PLUME: Now, let us locate the quantum shard and retrieve your toy, so we may rest for the day. 6 5 PHLOX: Okay, papa!
